DOC.HEADLINE: BRIEFLY : LABOR
DOC.TEXT: Talks Between Caterpillar , UAW Collapse : Negotiations broke_down between Caterpillar Inc. and the United Auto Workers , with no progress_reported and the union threatening a strike by 14 # 000 workers tonight. " We tried , we honestly tried to avert the strike deadline , " UAW Secretary-Treasurer Bill Casstevens said . The strike would close Caterpillar factories in Illinois , Memphis , Denver and York , Pa . Caterpillar Vice_President Wayne Zimmerman said the union won ' t budge on its ultimatum to strike unless the company reinstates 14 fired union_members . The firings are among 90 unfair-labor-practice complaints that are being pursued by the National Labor Relations Board .
